entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is mentioned as noticing Hagrid glance at the fire and looking at it too.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having a huge, black egg in his fireplace.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as crouching over the fire to get a closer look at the egg.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. She is mentioned as asking Hagrid what he is going to do with the egg when it hatches.

entities.name: kettle
entities.description: A kitchen appliance used for boiling water. It is mentioned as being underneath the huge, black egg in Hagrid's fireplace.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: A huge, black egg found in Hagrid's fireplace. It is mentioned as having been won by Hagrid in a game of cards.

relationships.description: Hagrid has the egg. He is mentioned as saying 'That's - er... That's mine' when Harry asks him about it.
Ron observes the egg. He is mentioned as crouching over the fire to get a closer look at it.
Hermione asks Hagrid about the egg. She is mentioned as saying 'But what are you going to do with it when it's hatched?'
The kettle contains water, which is being boiled by the fire. The egg is underneath the kettle.
